title: Deception And Suspense By The Sea In The Iranian Mystery 'About Elly'
teaser: Recently released in the U.S., Asghar Farhadi's 2009 film follows a teacher invited on a beach trip by the mother of one of her students. David Edelstein calls the film "Hitchockian" in its suspense.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
